name: Ilum & Ireal
description:
Ilum:

From Karum side, the kingdom of physics and chemicals. She has a sphere of physics, which she can leave her clone to leave the button pressed.

Ireal:

From the Laytun side, the kingdom of freedom. He has form a crown, which he can jump higher to the top of his kingdom.
